name: quantile
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of the points at which a large range of numbers, results, etc. is divided to make four groups of the same size: We can then calculate the median or any other quantile. The table compares the scores of students at various quantiles. Compare
percentile
More examplesFewer examplesWe then looked at various quantiles in the distribution.Table 1 gives some selected quantiles. If natural cut-points are not apparent, then quantiles can be used.
